company.name: Wonolo Inc
company.description: On-demand staffing marketplace connecting businesses with pre-screened workers

primary: Lead React Native app architecture and development decisions
Drive JavaScript to TypeScript migration across entire mobile codebase
Optimize CI/CD pipelines for faster deployment cycles
secondary: Collaborate with product team on feature requirements
Participate in code reviews and architectural discussions
Support QA team with testing strategies
leadership: Guide architecture decisions for mobile team
Champion best practices across engineering org
technical: Implement automated testing workflows with Jest and React Testing Library
Configure BuildKite and GitHub Actions pipelines
Establish TypeScript coding standards and migration strategy
Optimize app performance and bundle sizes
business: Reduce deployment risk through improved CI/CD processes
Increase developer productivity through better tooling
Improve app stability reducing customer support tickets

projects.name: JavaScript to TypeScript Migration
projects.description: Complete migration of React Native app from JavaScript to TypeScript
projects.impact: Reduced runtime errors by 40% and improved developer experience
challenges: Legacy code with no type definitions
Large codebase with complex state management
solutions: Incremental migration strategy with gradual type adoption
Custom TypeScript configuration for React Native
Comprehensive testing strategy to catch regressions

projects.name: CI/CD Pipeline Optimization
projects.description: Redesigned build and deployment pipeline for mobile apps
projects.impact: 30% reduction in build times, 50% fewer failed deployments

projects.name: Automated Testing Infrastructure
projects.description: Implemented comprehensive testing strategy for mobile app
projects.impact: 20% reduction in post-release bugs, 60% faster QA cycles
challenges: Limited test coverage in existing codebase

achievements.description: Reduced deployment time by 30% through CI/CD optimization
achievements.metrics: From 45 minutes to 30 minutes average build time

achievements.description: Decreased post-release bugs by 20% with automated testing
achievements.impact: Improved user experience and reduced support costs

achievements.description: Successfully migrated 50,000+ lines of code to TypeScript
achievements.impact: Improved code maintainability and developer productivity

achievements.description: Mentored 2 junior developers to mid-level proficiency
achievements.impact: Increased team capacity and knowledge sharing
achievements.metrics: Both developers received promotions within 12 months
